casebody.data:
DYE
v.
DYE. No. 291P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. John B. Hatfield, Jr., Kathryn K. Hatfield, for Carey J. Dye.

Carey James Dye, Pro Se.

Daniel James Dye, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of October 2007 by Defendant for Transcription:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
